com.foreach.across.modules.entity.query.support

Class ExpandingEntityQueryConditionTranslator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.query.support.ExpandingEntityQueryConditionTranslator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntityQueryConditionTranslator

    public final class ExpandingEntityQueryConditionTranslator
extends Object
implements EntityQueryConditionTranslator
    Implementation of EntityQueryConditionTranslator that expands a single condition to either an OR or a AND query of multiple properties. Mostly used for text properties, where a single property (eg. "name like X") could be expanded to a query on multiple (eg. "firstName like X or lastName like X").

    When the original condition has an EntityQueryOps operand where EntityQueryOps.isNegation() is true, the expanded query will have a reverse operand than the one originally defined. Eg:

    • name like X would be expanded to firstName like X or lastName like X
    • name not like X would be expanded to firstName not like X and lastName not like X
    Since:
    2.2.0
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
